title: Love Eternal
text:
Love has found it’s way to me,
from a place so divine.
I hope it’s here to stay,
within this lonely heart of mine.
She came to me on a day,
when I needed her the most.
In my heart, she will have,
loves eternal host.
She’s like a beautiful angel,
soaring in the skies.
She’s here to stay,
I can see it in her eyes.

replies.text: Rosalega fallegt ljóð!!! Heppin sú sem þú skrifaðir það til :)
